title: The Dew of Their Youth
author: Crockett, S. R. (Samuel Rutherford)
snippet: Sometimes he would ride off up a loaning to some farm-town wherehe had a job to be seen to, or rap with the butt of his loaded whip atthe door of some roadside inn--the Four Mile house or Crocketford, wherehe would call for a tankard and drain it off, as it were, with one tossof the head.
